name: eBay Cars
description: A full-stack single-page used car buying and selling web app where people can buy and sell their car.
features: Login system with firebase, private routes and dashboard for admins and users.
Users can book for a car and monitor their booking list.
Seller can add their product and monitor their all products.
Seller can advertise their product and all advertised items will be display to the advertisement section.
Admin can add a new admin and delete all types of users from the site.
Admin can make any seller verified and after verifying the blue check sign will add next to the seller's name.
Minimalistic UI, great UX and fully responsive

name: Get Snappy
description: A full-stack single-page photography service review web app where user can give review and monitor their review.
features: Login system with firebase and private routes
Users can give review and monitor their reviewlist.
Users can delete or update their review
Multi-column layout: See at a quick glance all the services and the reviews.
Minimalistic UI, great UX and fully responsive

name: Coding Ninja
description: A full-stack single-page Ed-Tech web app where users can buy premium access and more.
features: Login system with firebase and private routes
Users can buy premium access for the courses
Users can download any course details in pdf file by clicking on download button
Multi-column layout: See at a quick glance all the courses
Minimalistic UI, great UX and fully responsive
